game.name: Oort Protocol: Perihelion
game.shortDescription: Command 4 soldiers through brutal tactical combat in this hardcore roguelike trilogy. No tutorials. No mercy. Learn through failure as you fight across the solar system in a CRT-styled, turn-based war where your choices determine humanity's fate.
